title: T206 Commons and SL's - Old Mill/Piedmont
author: Baseball*Collectibles

posts.post_title: T206 Commons and SL's - Old Mill/Piedmont
posts.post_content:
For sale is a small group of T206's with Old Mill and Piedmont backs.  Prices below do not include shipping.  Shipping is $3.50 no matter how many cards you buy.  If interested, please send a PM or email to [url]tbotticell@gmail.com[/url].  Pictures will be added shortly.

Abbaticchio P150/25 $22 *SOLD*
Campbell Old Mill $34 *SOLD*
Donlin P/150/25 $26 *SOLD*
Easterly Old Mill $42 *SOLD*
Ellam Old Mill $30 *SOLD*
Graham Old Mill $34 *SOLD*
Hannifan Old Mill $26 *SOLD*
Manning P350-460/25 $19
McCormick Old Mill $48 *SOLD*
Persons Old Mill $30 *SOLD*
Smith Old Mill $23 *SOLD*
Sweeney Old Mill $28 *SOLD*

Thanks,

Tom

I'll take Persons if still available.

Thank you,
Mike
Paid for the Hannifan, thanks again!
